page.title: 20Friday Market
page.content: Every Friday morning there is a Market in Tring. It is held in the church car park and starts around half past eight.Some Fridays there are different stalls but most of the time they are the same .Around 3 o,clock the market finishes and the people clear up.These are some of the stalls which come on Friday: Pet home care, Health food, Fresh farm eggs, clothes ,Florist, Toys, Junk, Vegetables, Fishmonger, White Elephant, Dress makers, Tools, Housework, cheese, Jewelry, Cards and Book stalls.
